csstest.def: NEGATED substring matching attribute selector on middle
csstest.author: Daniel Glazman
csstest.cssrules: div.stub > * { color : red } div.stub *:not([title*=" on"]) { color : lime }

div.p: This paragraph should be in green characters.
This paragraph should be in green characters.

p.title: si on chantait
p.span: This paragraph should be in green characters.
